column4: it says :failled to open audio output:eSound Output plygin 1.2.10
i think you need the mp3 decoding libraries installed.
there's a howto for this on the wiki AFAIK

the reason it's not in Ubuntu natively is due to the fast Ubuntu only ships free software by default. non-free (covered by patents or non GPL friendly licensing) must be installed by you after the fact.
